title: Strongly recommend not being chat restricted
body:
It seems that once you've been chat restricted that all it takes to get another 15 chat ban is to get reported ONCE. So if someone just gets randomly grumpy with you and reports you for ANYTHING at the end of the game you get chat restricted. I play the game to be social and this really kills the fun of the game.

Don't get chat restricted in the first place? I got restricted from people reports multiple games in a row from people thinking I'm not good enough...

replies.body:
How does one get chat restricted in the first place? 

Tell everyone and their mother to "get cancer and die in a hole?" 

Or is it just normal trash talk?

He probably deserved it lol

Give him 100 extras he will learn

First time yes, it was warranted. People were abusing me so I abused back, should have just muted them. That is what I do with people that are abusive now, which results in me being reported, which results in me being chat restricted and can't communicate with people I actually what to strategise with. Bad system is bad
No, if u werent toxic in the first place then u wouldnt be restricted. gg
You don't have to be toxic to receive a chat restriction, pretty sure it's like 10-20 reports so all it takes is playing with minimum 3 premade teams of 4 that report you for no reason at all.
